targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  ((data->>'total_sites')::NUMERIC) as TotalSites,
  ((data->>'total_ns')::NUMERIC) as TotalNs,
  ((data->>'total_aaaa')::NUMERIC) as TotalAaaa,
  ((data->>'total_www')::NUMERIC) as TotalWww,
  ((data->>'total_both')::NUMERIC) as TotalBoth
FROM
  metrics
WHERE measurement = 'domains'
SELECT id, time from metrics where measurement = 'crawler' ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT count(1) 
FROM domain
WHERE ts_check IS NULL
AND disabled is FALSE;
SELECT id, time from metrics where measurement = 'crawler_campaign' ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT count(1) 
FROM domain
WHERE (ts_check < now() - '3 days' :: interval) 
OR (ts_check IS NULL)
AND disabled is FALSE;
select count(1) from domain where disabled = true
select count(1) from campaign_domain where disabled = false
SELECT * from changelog order by id desc limit 50
SELECT id,ts,message from campaign_changelog order by id desc limit 50

SELECT
  time,
  ((data->>'duration')::NUMERIC) as duration
FROM
  metrics
WHERE measurement = 'crawler'

SELECT
  time,
  ((data->>'updated')::NUMERIC) as Updated
FROM
  metrics
WHERE measurement = 'crawler'

SELECT
  time,
  ((data->>'duration')::NUMERIC) as duration

  metrics

SELECT
  time,

  metrics
